title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: NIGHTMARE CASTLE and CEMETARY OF THE LIVING DEAD

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: NIGHTMARE CASTLE and CEMETARY OF THE LIVING DEAD
sources.description: COMPLETE DVD. Contains menu, opening previews, first feature, intermission, second feature, and closing. Here's how: Download the zipped folder, open it and extract the VIDEO_TS folder. Now you're ready to burn your dvd. It's all set up for you.Â  Too flamin' easy! I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This dvd has a Barbara Steele double feature, NIGHTMARE CASTLE and CEMATARY OF THE LIVING DEAD (a.k.a. TERROR CREATURES FROM THE GRAVE). Enjoy the show!
